ResumeParserData.Experience: HSBC Bank  Senior Business Analyst  Manchester, UK  2017 - Present  Lead business analysis activities for strategic projects.  Conduct data analysis to identify opportunities for business improvement.  Develop and document detailed business requirements and process flows.  Facilitate workshops and meetings with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide project updates.  Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and internal policies.  Key Achievements :   Successfully led the implementation of a new customer relationship management (CRM) system.  Improved reporting processes, reducing manual efforts by 25%.  Barclays Bank  Business Analyst  Manchester, UK  2013 - 2017  Conducted data analysis to support business decision-making.  Gathered and documented business requirements for new projects.  Developed business cases and project proposals.  Provided training and support to users on new systems and processes.  Key Achievements :   Led a project to automate data reporting, reducing reporting time by 20%.  Identified key performance indicators that improved operational efficiency.  Lloyds Banking Group  Junior Business Analyst  Manchester, UK  2010 - 2013  Assisted in gathering and documenting business requirements.  Conducted data analysis to support project proposals.  Supported the development and implementation of new systems.  Key Achievements :   Played a key role in the successful implementation of a new online banking platform.  Improved data validation processes, enhancing data accuracy.

 Improved reporting processes, reducing manual efforts by 25%.
